name: The Secret of Pineview Forest
description: The Secret of Pineview Forest is a free prequel to Pineview Drive - Rising Storm. Behind the abandoned house on Pineview Drive lies ominous Pineview Forest...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows®  Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ X2, min. 2.8 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Adapter generation: nVidia GeForce GTX 570 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows®  Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad / AMD® Phenom™ X4, min. 3,4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Adapter generation: nVidia GeForce GTX 780 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Ok,I was not expecting much and I was pleasantly surprised.Free prequel to their upcoming full release.Spooky,the sound design is amazing(makes the game for me).Damn movement in the weeds full time and the freaking deer making noises all over.Had my tinglers working early.A lot of players are going to complain about the excessive walking and I normally would agree but,I wasn't annoyed with this one because of said effects.Owls,Crows and other crawlies making sounds gets the bumps bangin' throughout the whole thing for me.I loved it. (Some will not) 8\10  Edit:I forgot to mention...if you aren't careful and thinking things through BEFORE you act you are going to get SPANKED!Quickly,and then take it out on the Devs.Not cool.If I got through it....a monkey could.

Ok, I take back what I said. It's a good game. The jumpscare at the end got me, but the rest was just ok. I think it's a good game, but I hear some people can't get past that crazy hunter. I did, and that's why I change my opinion.
